Upcoming Events

Come and Meet us at the Ohio National Poultry Show!

We have consistently showed at the Ohio National for over a decade, and will be bringing poultry to sell! If you would like to set up a meeting at the Ohio National, please contact Janet and Jeff Phelps via email to do that! We would love to meet you.
